"Thanks, whats the game and who's the players?" Lunarpine was willing to
hear things out, he fealt a debt to these maximals. without them he'd
probably still be stuck in the wilderness. He also felt a debt to Veratis,
he still wasn't sure why yet but the wolf in him now felt complete.

He looked at the launcher and chip he held in his hands "Impressive" his
hand caressed the side like something long cared for then lost. "But
irrelovent." he lowered the launcher to the table it origionated on and
stepped back. he didn't feal forced to, but somehow obligated to respect
Veratis' wishes regaurding the posession of weapons of any sort.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 8:56 AM
Subject: Maximals


> ::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Chordate/Rex/Perndabot::
>
> Ramulus spins around as he hears Lunarpine, looking the bot over. He
> nods.
>
> "Nice look," he says, tossing Lunarpine a chip and a gun from the
> pile.
>
> "A new faction, The Trainers have a mind controll device. That chip
> will save you from it if its implanted on you," he explains, "The gun
> will disable their chip, and also launch a protecting one."
>
> He turns his head as he hears bots land outside, Firearm, Proto, and
> Smokescreen walking in.
>
> "Kluster told us to help you out," Firearm says, "What's goin' on?"
>
> Ramulus pucks up three chips and three guns. "There might be a battle
> soon," he says as he gives the devices to them, "Involving a mind
> control device. Those chips will protect your mind, and the gun will
> disable the control chip."
>
> The three Maximals nod, taking a chip and a gun each and proceeding
> to
> insert the chips into themselves.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> (OOC: Is this a nerve gas as in it'll drive Rex insane?)
>
> Rex swears as he sees a can fall near him, coughing when the gas
> starts to spread around the room.
>
> "I need backup here!" he yells into his comm before falling down.
> Everything goes black as he loses conciousness.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Chordate swears as he hears Rex's message, tapping a few keys to
> bring
> up a scan of the room Rex was in. He swears. The computer reported a
> gas.
>
> "We ne-" he begins to say into his comm-link, but stops. He might as
> well do this himself.
>
> "Hatch seal. No one is to enter or exit the ship untill situation is
> resolved. Red alert." he says to the computer, sirens sounding and
> light flashing all around the Cybertronian Fire as every exit hatch
> closes and locks, the defences on full alert. Chordate runs out of
> the
> bridge, his gun ready.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Perndabot stops at a door. He was pretty sure this is where
> BrightBlade was.
>
> He swears as sirens sound all around him, looking around to make sure
> no Maximals were here yet. Raising a fist, he smashes it down on the
> door, making a dent. Perndabot continues to try to take the door out,
> hurrying in case any Maxim
>
>
>
>
